import addProduct from "../utils/addProduct" export default function Cadastrar() { const [data, setData] = useState({ codeInput: '', descriptionInput: '', sizeInput: '' }) function handle(e) { const newData = {...data} newData[e.target.id] = e.target.value setData(newData) } return ( <>
await submit(e)}>
